name: Reality Switch
description:
Reality Switch - Time Killer Game, Is a total adventure. Start off in the black and white world obstacle world. As you play you'll collect coins. The farther you travel the more difficult the obstacles get. Which the game play will always keep you guessing.
From the first world, knowing how to play. You can now go to our world select in the UI and select a world where your in the woods! Dodge, Weaving, around spears as you head forward collecting coins.
Now your bored? Don't worry there's even more game play such as the desert. The problem is there is caucus's everywhere! Flying how is that even possible. Well if you smart you would get hit by one! Because that will end in a not so fun game over.
Collecting coins, Yes I said that many time now. What's it all for? Well you guessed it! You collect coins to buy brand new characters to play these awesome game plays with.

MORE TO COME SOON!
